li.label: straight
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is attracted to the opposite gender.

li.label: asexual (het)
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is asexual, but is romantically attracted to the opposite gender.

li.label: asexual (bi)
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is asexual, but is romantically attracted to both genders.

li.label: asexual (homo)
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is asexual, but is romantically attracted to the same gender.

li.label: asexual (aro)
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't experience romantic or sexual attraction.
